attributes.action: I want tom moore to receive a knighthood for his services for this country.
attributes.additional_details: Because you can get it to come into light to the public to the media.
attributes.background: I want this man knighted and I don't think I'll be the only one in the country to think so I think this petition will get the hero the knighthood he truly deserves

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
